channel.title: Prototype on SensiMAR
channel.description: Recent content in Prototype on SensiMAR

item.title: SensiMAR: The visual Content
item.description: Over the last month, I have produced visual content to be on display for the SensiMAR experience. This data relates to the reconstruction of one part of the House of Cantaber, from Conimbriga. This article shows what was reconstructed, and why.
